Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The mekonari and their allies foment rebellion in Nightwood.

Drive out the {@LinkCreature:56#11#runekeeper deceivers}, {@LinkCreature:56#13#spectral legates}, and mekonari {@LinkCreature:56#15#occultists}, {@LinkCreature:56#57#hunters}, and {@LinkCreature:56#58#ebonweavers}.

Report to Emya in Dragonfall when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
